title: Not crippled, not useless
creator_contributor_role: Public Action for Community Television, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped children - Education
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Mainstreaming in education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Spina Bifida
description: Michael Briffa is fourteen and will probably be confined to a wheelchair for the rest of his life. This program explores Michael's determination and success in being allowed to enrol in an ordinary school. As well, Michael's parents discuss their attitudes to special schools.
